name: KajalTalk
_source: s;Kajal;It seems that House Morrissey will be the next to fall.
s;Simon;Not necessarily. Even if this comes to blows, Anuki lives on.
s;Kajal;True, traditionally your child would inherit the mother's name.|But will she choose to keep it?
s;Kajal;Exactly.{w} I must say, though I have some respect for Lord Morrissey,|his achievements pale compared to your's and Vesner's.
s;Kajal;You and Vesner are men of action.|I respect that, and others will too.
